def give_last(arr):
    last_value = arr[0]
    q = 0
    while q < len(arr):
        last_value = arr[q]
        q += 1
    return last_value

The loop then iterates until it reaches the end of the array, `q` increasing by one with each iteration. Therefore, `last_value` contains the last element of the array.
